title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Build and optimize user interfaces for millions of users. Work with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Mentor available from senior engineers.

title: Data Science & ML Intern
description: Work on machine learning models and data pipelines. Use Python, TensorFlow, and cloud technologies. Real-world projects and mentorship included.

title: UI/UX Designer Intern
description: Design beautiful interfaces and create user experiences. Work with product teams and learn design systems. Tools: Figma, Protopie, User testing.

title: Backend Engineer Intern
description: Build scalable backend systems handling millions of requests. Learn AWS, microservices architecture, and distributed systems.

title: Mobile App Development Intern
description: Develop mobile applications used by billions. Work with React Native, Swift, or Kotlin. Learn from world-class engineers at Meta.

title: DevOps & Cloud Engineer Intern
description: Work with cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization. Learn Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS or Azure. Real deployment experience.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Build complete web applications from frontend to backend. Learn modern tech stack and agile development practices.

title: AI/ML Research Intern
description: Work on cutting-edge AI research and model development. Publish papers and contribute to open-source projects. Top-tier mentorship.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: Learn cybersecurity practices, ethical hacking, and security audits. Hands-on experience with real security challenges.

title: Product Manager Intern
description: Work on product strategy, user research, and feature development. Learn from experienced PMs and influence product decisions.

title: Blockchain Developer Intern
description: Build blockchain applications and smart contracts. Learn Solidity, Web3.js, and DeFi protocols. Shape the future of crypto.

title: Content & SEO Intern
description: Create engaging content and optimize for search. Learn content marketing, SEO best practices, and analytics tools.
